name: chicagotribune
text: The graduated income tax plan appearing on ballots this fall in Illinois would lower the average tax rate for 97% of the state's wage earners and is projected to raise $3.4 billion in the next budget year. Here's what to know about the proposed amendment https://t.co/zAUpxYahjb
